'''Fair's Thoughts in Order''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Fair's Thoughts in Order is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.

First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
